mapper.select: SELECT TRUNC(sales_date) as salesDate, SUM(total_price) as totalPrice FROM sales_prac WHERE sales_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TRUNC(sales_date) ORDER BY TRUNC(sales_date)
SELECT trunc(sales_date) AS sales_date, SUM(sales_qty) AS total_sales FROM sales_prac GROUP BY trunc(sales_date) ORDER BY trunc(sales_date)
SELECT sold_product_name, sold_qty, sold_date FROM sales_qty_prac WHERE trunc(sysdate, 'month') = trunc(sold_date, 'month')
SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM sales_prac WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(sales_date, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(sales_date, 'MM')
SELECT SUM(total_price) * 0.15 AS estimated_operating_profit FROM sales_prac WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(sales_date, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(sales_date, 'MM')
